approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

deprecate.description: Marks the contract as deprecated and sets a new address.

addBlackList.description: Adds an address to the blacklist.

removeBlackList.description: Removes an address from the blacklist.

destroyBlackFunds.description: Destroys the blacklisted funds of a user.

setParams.description: Sets the fee basis points and maximum fee.

issue.description: Issues new tokens to the caller’s account.

redeem.description: Redeems tokens from the caller’s account.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

Issue.description: Emitted when new tokens are issued.

Deprecate.description: Emitted when the contract is deprecated.

Params.description: Emitted when the fee parameters are updated.

DestroyedBlackFunds.description: Emitted when blacklisted funds are destroyed.

AddedBlackList.description: Emitted when an address is added to the blacklist.

RemovedBlackList.description: Emitted when an address is removed from the blacklist.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Pause.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpause.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.
